reviews.review_msg: Great professor. Get ready to read! If you want to learn about the subject matter take this class. Class discussions are great if everyone participates. You will also write a lot in this class so be ready to engage with the material. The professor is always available if you require advice or knowledge on the material. Great prof if you work hard!

He is very knowledgeable and is often very engaging. Readings were often very difficult, and we had over 120 pages per week to read. He's a real GPA-killer for anyone who can't dedicate an exorbitant amount of time into the course. I did come out learning a lot more than I've learned in any other course though: Learned lots, but grading is hard.

Very strict in both attendance and grading.  Finds it difficult to foster class discussion as he seeks to delve well into the minutia of the subject before most of the class can grasp the more general concepts.  Clearly an expert on Turkey, a nice guy and organizes the lecture subjects well, but besides that I found him a hard marker and too anal.
